event.title: FSFE at T-DOSE 2024 in Geldrop, Netherlands

body.p: FSFE will participate in this year's community-driven T-DOSE 2024 conference with an information booth and two presentations:

ul.li: Saturday June 1st, 13:00 - 13:50 CEST, Carmen Bianca, project manager of the REUSE initiative, will give a talk " REUSE: best practices for copyright and licensing"
Sunday June 2nd, 12:00 - 12:50 CEST, Nico Rikken, coordinator Netherlands, will hold a Ada & Zangemann book reading

body.p: Meet us at the booth for stickers and merchandise, to discuss topics like router freedom, banking apps and software en education, and to view our progress on the Ada & Zangemann book translation.
Admission is free. More details can be found on the conference page. We look forward to seeing you there.
